alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:56AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Dawson County through 630 AM CDT... At 556 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Lexington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lexington around 605 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Overton and Sumner. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 226 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
